reviews.review: Just buy it you don't even need an explanation if you're looking at this.
Не игра- Нужен ещё и HL1 оригинальный, но игра хорошая.

Fue muy entretenido y las nuevas armas eran divertidas de usar. Una cosa, como dlc esta bien, pero se pasaron un montón con la dificultad. Me costo la misma cantidad de tiempo pasarme este dlc que el juego original, ambos a máxima dificultad. Morí mil veces en los mismos lugares debido a lo duro que eran los enemigos.
there is a great variety of weps and aliens, and the game is long :) also, there are some cameos of gordon and a female protagonist of HL Decay...

Excelente juego, al igual que Half life, una historia muy entretenida y momentos muy emocionante y de mucha acción. Aunque la jugabilidad se siente muy antigua, como cuando caminas, subes escaleras o la selección de armas (que en muchas ocasiones resultan muy frustrantes) el juego merece totalmente la pena.

Игра хорошо дополняет историю оригинальной части. И нервы трепает тоже знатно) Увеличенный набор оружия, динамичный геймплей, враги сложные. Если сильно не тупить, проходится часов за пять. В общем, рекомендую к ознакомлению.
Actually nice, I recommend it to anyone who wants to go deeper into the franchise. It does a really good job at expanding the main game!
so cool...i love half life...
esquece half-life 3,  eu quero Opposing Force 2!
La mejor extensión.

Half Life: Opposing Force è un FPS, la storia gira attorno a quella del primo Half Life.
Il protagonista è il caporale dei Marine Shepard il cui obiettivo iniziale è di uccidere tutte le testimonianze del disastro accaduto al centro di ricerca di Black Mesa, ma un imprevisto cambia tutto...

La grafica è decente, il gioco usa lo stesso motore grafico del primo.

Se avete giocato ad Half Life allora vi consiglio di giocare anche questo, non ne rimarrete delusi!

Voto: [b]7.9[/b]

A nice addition to Half-Life 1 and an intriguing new perspective to the Black Mesa Incident. I also really like the new additions to the gameplay, like rope climbing and the new weapons and aliens. It immediately felt like you are a soldier who is stronger than the other protagonists because your first pistol deals more damage than the other starting pistols. My only complaint would be that it's a bit short and (probably as a consequence) the events feel a little rushed, for example, the soldiers in Opposing Force seem to pull out very shortly after they came... they were much more 'present' as opponents in Half-Life 1. Still a solid 9/10 imo.

[h1]Half-Life: Opposing Force[/h1]
[u]Kategorie: Akční / Datadisk[/u]
Hrajete za Andriana Sheparda a vydáváte se do Black Mesa výzkumného zařízení uklidit po nezdařeném experimentu nejen monstra z jiného světa, ale i vědce. Něco co se zdálo jako snadný úkol se však zvrtne, naneštěstí vás právě vědci zachrání a vy víte, že musíte pro přežití porušit rozkaz.
[h1]Rozšíření[/h1]
Opposing Force je skvělé rozšíření které ukazuje události původního Half Life z jiného pohledu, dočkáte se nových zbraní, monster a také samozřejmě H.E.C.U. vojáků kteří vám pomohou ale zároveň budete bojovat proti Spec Ops nepřátelům. Datadisk je poměrně chaotický takže zde najdete hnedka ze začátku poměrně silné nepřátele.
[h1]Kladné[/h1]
[u]+ Nové zbraně
+ Skvělý příběh
+ Jiný pohled na stejnou událost
+ Nový nepřátelé
+ Poměrně slušná herní doba[/u]
[h1]Záporné[/h1]
[u]- Bugy
- Noční vidění
- pár bugů[/u]
[h1]Závěr[/h1]
Half-Life: Opposing Force je skvělé rozšíření a doufám že se někdy dočkáme remasteru / remaku Operation Black Mesa.
PS: Mitchell Shepard (to je ten z Hunt Down the Freeman) ať si nasere.

[h1]Hodnocení: Skvělé (7 z 10)[/h1]
The best expansion pack title game ever made.
КАЕФ
its better than hl1
A very underrated game. Not too long, early access to better weapons. an interesting protagonist on par with Gordon Freeman. I kinda hope Shephard can make his return.

Honestly, I'd say it's almost better than the main game. Even despite the dated graphics, the environments are still awesome. You get several new weapons and all of them are fun to use. And for its age, this game is still amazingly functional and doesn't make you jump through hoops for it to work. You might run into some technical issues, especially with the mouse, but if I managed to fix it, then so can you.
果然还是逃脱不了虫子的魅力

Un buen spin-off que nos pone desde otra perspectiva del accidente de Black Mesa; no hay mucho que decir, la calidad se mantiene a pesar de ser un juego mucho más corto que la entrega original (bueno es un spin-off que esperaban), mejoran algunos aspectos de la jugabilidad, hay una mayor variedad de armas y enemigos; en general, si te gusto el primer juego este sin duda te gustara.
I love Opposing Force and Adrain Shephard

This game aged horribly. Either it was a buggy mess back then or is now.  Stupid AI (i've seen black operatives, by far best enemies in the game blow themselves up with grenades at least five times during playthrough), laughably easy bosses, poor shooting mechanics, god-awful grenade throwing physics, clumsy moving. Maybe someday someone will make a BlackMesa grade remake of this entry to the series, until then - definitely recommend skipping this one.

Very fun. Half-Life Opposing force is a great game. Lets you step into the boots of a H.E.C.U Marine.
Since your a Marine there are new types of allies like the medic and the engineer. Also comes with a almost brand new weapon pack. Like the Desert Eagle, Spore launcher, Shock roach and more! So what are you waiting for? play the game and get ready to shoot everything in sight.

frikin awesome, 10/10 for DLC (Expansion pack). It is the story of the Black Mesa incident, told from another perspective, expanding what we had known from before. Try it out trust me, 4 euros aint gonna burn your hole.

This expansion alone is a better game than a lot of modern and old shooters alike. Exceptionally well designed levels and set pieces, interesting new enemies, weapons and new protagonist, all while respecting the tone and feel of the original game. If you enjoyed Half-Life and feel like returning to Black Mesa once more there is no reason not to give this a try.

Half-Life gave you guns? Well, here's more guns! Half-Life gave you weird looking aliens? Well, here's some more! Half-Life made you play as a scientist? Congrats son, you're a Marine now! Crowbar? Nah, pipe wrench is where its at! Use aliens as weapons? Heck yeah, brother! Oorah! More G-Man? Affirmative. More cool gameplay? Roger that. A fine expansion to a legendary game.

针锋相对和蓝色行动不一样，这代制作明显更用心。本代时间线在黑山“忘了弗里曼”这一关左右开始，故事上和戈登，gman更紧密，Gman频繁出现甚至主角和戈登擦肩而过。但谢尔德面临的敌人更加强大，也更丰富，黑色行动的新敌人和新武器，外星人的各种新敌人和新武器，甚至还有藤壶枪，这是真想tm挑战我的生理极限，本来就恶心藤壶，强忍着把黑山打完好了点，现在我是彻底不恶心藤壶了。藤壶枪就是钩爪，而且这次主角甚至会爬绳子，相比之下蓝色行动就有点拉跨了。队友系统也非常厉害，队友是解密过关的钥匙，不同的队友又有不同的作用，虽然队友AI沾点脑瘫。
Muito bom otimo game
The best Half-Life spinoff. Improves upon the original and tries new things out.
Довольно крутое дополнение к оригиналу. Ввели куча нового оружия, врагов. Проходиться часа 3-5 . Рекомендую однозначно.
Imagine Half-Life, but minus the really long drawn-out sections. This is a really solid experience.
